Edwina Pettway (amụrụ n'afọ 1950) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị otu Gee's Bend quilting collective

Ọ mụtara ịkwa akwa n'aka nné ya, Candis Pettway, n'akụkụ ụmụnne ya nwanyị Qunnie Pettway na Sally Mae Pettway. A maara uwe elu ya màkà ịgwakọta ọdịnala Gee's Bend na "ihe karịrị akarị nke Hollywood na Las Vegas".
N'ịbụ ónyé sitere na ogologo usoro nné nkè ndị na-emepụta ihe, Dinah Miller bụ nne nne Edwina Pettway.
